attributes.additional_details:
Everyday passengers are traveling into and out of the uk.
The only way to help stop the spread of the Corina virus is to stop people coming into or going out of the uk.
The only flights, ferries or channel tunnel entry into uk should be freight only.
We need to stop potentially importing the Corona virus from across the world. 
Close all Borders now until this pandemic is over.
There is no need for business travel as meetings can be done by video conference.
attributes.background: All uk borders should be closed to people until covid 19 corona virus. Has been eliminated.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
